page.title: 18FISHING ROUND ST MARY'S
page.content: {Fishing These are some of the fish that is caught around these island there is plaice,John Dory,Brill,Halibut,Lemon Sole,Cod,Dover sole,Monk Fish,Turbot, Hake,Pollock, some Mackrel,Skate, crabs,Lobsters and Cray fish.There are three trawlers on the island one is my uncle his boats name is the Swan Dancer she also has a one ton winch that pulls the net in and out of the water they some times catch big rocks that rip the net.The Swan Dancer usually bottom trawls. Tim Richards and my uncle both sell their fish to the fish market in Newlyn they take their fish over in the boats or they pack them in ice and put it on the Scillonion.Some people go potting they go out in there boats and set strings of pots then they leave them over night and collect them next day.
